channel.title: Vector-Db on The ML Surgeon
channel.description: Recent content in Vector-Db on The ML Surgeon

item.title: A quick incision: five minutes to RAG
item.description: Hello, my dear students! How is life treating you? I hope you’ve spent your vacation relaxing, far, far away from the tools of our trade. After all, a good surgeon needs to rest after a long year of work and learning, right?
